description:
In this course, you will learn the basics of Blender through the creation process of a maze game.

This course will teach you the following skills:

  • Basic Blender keyboard shortcuts and hot keys
  • Animation and object manipulation
  • Materials and Textures
  • Game engine and logic bricks
  • How to export a stand alone game

At the end of this course, you should have the foundations of blender for you to pursue your own artistic visions as you advance in your Blender adventures.
title: Learn Blender for Begininers
